Headline: #74 Fullerton Temporary Reroute at Fullerton/Latrobe
ShortDescription: 74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted via Fullerton, Laramie, Grand, Central and Fullerton, due to street blockage near Fullerton/Latrobe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Fullerton, Laramie, Grand, Central and Fullerton, due to street blockage near Fullerton/Latrobe.

Allow extra travel time.
